snippet.title: Muv Luv Unlimited: The Day After Promo Video (English)
snippet.description:
Available now! 
Bundle:     https://store.steampowered.com/bundle/18646/MuvLuv_Unlimited__The_Day_After_ULTIMATE_COLLECTION/
Episode 00   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1407100
Episode 01   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1407090
Episode 02   https://store.steampowered.com/app/1342410
Episode 03   https://store.steampowered.com/app/789830


A story of mankind's struggle to survive in a world where most of the planet has become a salt-filled wasteland.

Set in one of the countless worlds of Muv-Luv Unlimited, where humanity has been forced to use gravity weapons to defeat the BETA invaders. The BETA were temporarily stopped, but at a terrible price: most of the planet's oceans and habitable land were destroyed. Now, the few humans that remain battle each other for the little habitable land that remains...
